comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: That microphone looks too advanced for the 1910s. Except for being on a different base, it resembles the 1925 Western Electric 1B, seen being used in a desktop version by Herbert Hoover in a photo on this page at the website of the history department of the University of San Diego. The guy's suit looks more 1920s than 1910s, too.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: And the date written on the negative, when flipped appropriately seems to read 3/27/25.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks!  We'll fix the date in the source data and reload the description.
